overview: PIRATES! is an adventure/drama set during the time of classic lego pirates.  John Todd is the first mate of Captain BlackHeart's crew of plundering pirates.  When John decideds to elope with his long love Anna Blackheart stands in their way.  Now it's up to Todd to save his daughter Ruby from the clutches of  the ruthless captain Blackheart, and make right all he has done wrong.
title: LEGO Pirates
